column5: Does anyone know of any good rod and reel repare places in the North Bay area?
Sam's Rod and Reel Repair 314 Foster Ave, North Bay, Phone: (705) 472-4710

From Sturgeon , turn left on Algonquin , Immediate right Behind the Canada Place Mall find O'Brien you'll see a sign in his yard ... no kiddin' he's really good & cheap... sell fishin' gear too.  Sorry I don't know his name or the real address  but I've been there.
The guy who owns Sam's died last year I believe. He was a nice guy who loved what he did.
I was talking to Sam yesterday...he's definetly not dead. I think I will give im a try, seems like he knows what he is talking about.

I just picked up my Soron STX20 from Sam`s (broken bail and needed a lube job). $24.00 all in! It would have cost me $20.00 just to ship it out to an Abu dealer for `assessment`.  he`ll be getting more business from me! Great person to deal with!
Sam is a great guy to deal with and his prices can't be beat.

Definitly not dead! lol Just got back from his place. He does a great job on my reels, and I get him to replace at least 5-6 broken guides per year lol   Just realized this post was started in May 2008  Nice bump Chad lol
